meaningMnemonic:
Your <kanji>spirit</kanji> <kanji>spirit</kanji> is… your <vocabulary>spirit</vocabulary>. This word is for the human <vocabulary>mind</vocabulary> and can refer to your mental state, thinking, attitude, mindset, or even willpower. 

Depending on the context, 精神 can also mean "spirit" as in the essence or core principle of something, like 独立の精神 (the spirit of independence).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
